Integration Test for All Converters

This HTML file is used for integration testing of all converters.

It contains various elements that converters should handle properly:

Text Formatting

Bold text and italic text and underlined text.

Superscript: E=mc2 and subscript: H2O.

Lists

  • Unordered list item 1
  • Unordered list item 2
  • Unordered list item 3
  1. Ordered list item 1
  2. Ordered list item 2
  3. Ordered list item 3

Tables

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Cell 1 Row 1, Cell 2 Row 1, Cell 3
Row 2, Cell 1 Row 2, Cell 2 Row 2, Cell 3

Links

Visit Example Website for more information.

Images

Special Characters

Copyright: © | Registered: ® | Trademark: ™

Accented characters: áéíóú ñ ü ö

Symbols: € £ ¥ ¢ § ¶ † ‡ •

Code

function helloWorld() {
    console.log("Hello, World!");
}

This is a blockquote. It contains text that is quoted from another source.
